'''Azure Obsidian Ring''' is an [[Adventure Item]], crafted with {{Item|Sunset-Blue Obsidian Fragment|x=3}}. Once obtained, it allows the player to access the [[Tribal Secret Space]] of the [["Collective of Plenty"]].

Tribal Secret Space Collective of Plenty Location Context.png|Tribal Secret Space in [["Collective of Plenty"]], [[Atocpan]]
